title: King of the Zombies (restored, colorized) (1941, horror-comedy, imdb score: 5.3)

sources.title: King of the Zombies (restored, colorized) (1941, horror-comedy, imdb score: 5.3)
sources.description: King of the Zombies is a 1941 American zombie comedy film directed by Jean Yarbrough and starring Dick Purcell , Joan Woodbury , and Mantan Moreland . The film was produced by Monogram Pictures , and was typical of its B films produced by the Pine-Thomas team. Along with flying scenes, the use of zany characters and slapstick efforts were juxtaposed with a spy and zombie story.
